# Overview of Lab XX

The objective of today is to immerse yourself in the Research Methods of
your Critical Proposal Target Paper

This may seem like an 'academic' exercise now.. but it is not!

## Reading

• Being able to read a single paper carefully and critically is an
important skill • Being able to synthesise multiple papers and
appreciate similarities and differences • Building on this effort to
identify 'gaps' or ways to build on strengths
